content: Whereas I'm not a clinician and cannot tell, is that possible that the Condition resource may be linked to other Condition resource, and therefore .partOf and basedOn elements may be required?
The linkage can be through Condition.evidence.detail as well as the dueTo, occurredFollowing, outcome, related and ruledOut extensions
partOf and basedOn have a different meaning and wouldn't really be appropriate for Condition
